event.title: Fellowship Meeting at Duesseldorf
event.body: The Duesseldorf Fellows will gather around a barrel of beer at 19:30 at the Pub "Friedrichskrone", Kirchfeldstr. 85. Fellowship Coordinator Matthias Kirschner, President Karsten Gerloff and Executive Director Christian Holz will be our guests. Interested people are welcome. Entry is free (as in in free beer).
